price: Mai gãfarta zunubi kuma Mai karɓar tũba Mai tsananin azãba, Mai wadãtarwa bãbu abin bautawa fãce Shi, zuwa gare Shi makõma take.
arabic: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ghāfiri al-dhanbi waqābili al-tawbi shadīdi al-ʿiqābi dhī al-ṭawli lā ilāha illā huwa ilayhi al-maṣīru
